info.author: Konrad Wojas
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
This is a module to easily access the Internet Movie Database, 
http://www.imdb.com 
 
Supported features: 
- searches 
- result caching 
- accessible data: movie title, year, rating, genre
info.name: IMDb
info.summary: Module to query the Internet Movie Database, http://www.imdb.com/
info.html_description:
This is a module to easily access the Internet Movie Database, http://www.imdb.com

Supported features: - searches - result caching - accessible data: movie title, year, rating, genre
